message:
Here are the steps to activate your TED device:


  1. Ensure your TED gateway has the latest firmware version.If not download and install it from: http://www.theenergydetective.com/firmwareupgrade
  2. Go to TED footprints from your local browser.Example: http://192.168.1.129/Footprints.html (Use your own network IP address.)
  3. Select edit> activate energy posting
  4. Copy the following values and paste them in their respective fields in footprints.Do NOT click on this URL:
    ActivationURL=http://esp.peoplepowerco.com/espapi/rest/activateted
    ActivationKey=123:20Q9mYSd14s0MWv5b
  5. Click "activate energy posting."
  6. The "activation successful" message confirms your activation is complete.
